titles.title: Family Office Technical Correction Act of 2017
Family Office Technical Correction Act of 2017
To clarify that family offices and family clients are accredited investors, and for other purposes.
Family Office Technical Correction Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 60 - 0.
